name: SafetyMama

* 200965 Pistillo Gianna s200965@studenti.polito.it Project Manager

###

![preg](http://nephcure.org/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/pregnancy-website.png)

# Vision
Are you pregnant?

SafetyMama is a system that helps you to attain a peaceful pregnancy in total safety. It collects and monitors data and information pertaining to your and your baby physical well-being. 

It is very important to walk, so a fitness tracker will monitor this aspect and give you automatic suggestions.

It allows you to listen to the heartbeat and movements of the fetus in order to be able to check in every moment of the day well-being of your child. Moreover is important to control your anxiety and stress status, as they could damage the health of the fetus, so SMa recognize if you are under stress, through the values of your heart rate, your blood pressure and your body temperature, and if you are at home it shall make you relax automatically activating a music system, chromotherapy and aromatherapy, to try to raise your level of well-being.

The weekly data collected will be automatically sent to your gynecologist, who will then be able to provide specific advice.
